com.communote.server.web.api.service

Class BaseApiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.support.ApplicationObjectSupport
      • org.springframework.web.context.support.WebApplicationObjectSupport
        • org.springframework.web.servlet.support.WebContentGenerator
          • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
            • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.BaseCommandController
              • com.communote.server.web.api.service.BaseApiController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApiResultApiController, AttachmentDownloadApiController, BinaryApiController
    Deprecated. 
    Use new generated REST-API instead

    @Deprecated
public abstract class BaseApiController
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.BaseCommandController
    BaseApiController is the base class for all API calls. It does the error handling and conversion to json or other formats. If inheriting from this controller overwrite #execute(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse)
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • compareVersions

        protected int compareVersions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              String version)
        Deprecated. 
        Compares the version. If compareVersion(request, 1.0.1) returns a value >=0 than the request supports this version.
        Parameters:
        request - the request to get the requested version from
        version - the version to compare (e.g. 1.0.1)
        Returns:
        a value greater 0 if the given version is lower than the one out of the request
        0 if the given version is equal to the one out of the request
        a value less 0 if the given version is greater than the one out of the request

      • getResourceId

        protected Long getResourceId(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             boolean throwOnError)
                      throws RequestedResourceNotFoundException
        Deprecated. 
        Get the resource id out of the request uri. E.g. if the uri is /api/v1.0/posts/12.json?filterHtml=true the method will return 12
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        throwOnError - if true a RequestedResourceNotFoundException will be thrown if the id is not parseable
        Returns:
        the id of the requested resource
        Throws:
        RequestedResourceNotFoundException - in case the uri is not parseable to a resource id

      • getResourceType

        protected String getResourceType()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the resource type, use for getResourceId(HttpServletRequest, boolean) exceptions
